summary: As long as you're Dovakin hasn't fear of heights this house is a nice starter home.
descriptionHtml:
Placed at the river across Riverwood, with a panorama view to all directions. Inside you'll find a forge, an alchemy lab, enchanting table, Tanning rack, Smithing workbench, grindstone, and an anvil, along with storing for many different items. Unfortunately there was no place for a smelter, and becouse it's a startershome there's no place for a follower. Probably thats why there's only a single bed inside. But with this view...who needs someone to share it with! 

Installing: Just unpack and pop it in you're data folder wich is: Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim/Data, or use an installer. 

Dovakin out...
author: arjan van het Riet
